Text saved: Life of Pi is the name of a book.  
It tells an amazing story.  
A teenage boy is the hero.  
He is from India.  
The ship he is on sinks in the Pacific Ocean.  
He is in a lifeboat.  
He is with a dangerous tiger.  
This is the third book by Yann Martel.  
Yann Martel is a Canadian author.  
The book came out in 2001.  
It sold over seven million copies all over the world.  
It won some prizes.  
They translated it into 41 languages.  
His father was a diplomat.  
A diplomat works for their country in other countries.  
As a child, he lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France and Mexico.
Feedback received: Grade 2/10 - FAIL

Suggestions:
Restore original adjectives and precise phrasing to increase semantic similarity and lexical overlap. Reuse ‘extraordinary’, ‘ferocious’, ‘worldwide’, and ‘several prizes’ to meet fidelity and meaning thresholds.
